name.baseName: Groundwater ex-situ remediation ; Groundwater pump and treat ; Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
地下水异位修复;地下水抽出处理;到达现场的设备和材料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Transportation of equipment and materials to the site
将设备与材料运输至现场

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Transportation of equipment and materials to the site after a 400km journey
经过400km路程，将设备和材料运输至现场
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents a process used for environmental remediation, specifically focused on groundwater. The described process, groundwater ex-situ remediation, involves the extraction of contaminated groundwater for treatment. The use of this data is applicable in the context of environmental management projects where groundwater pollution has been identified, and remediation is required to restore the quality of the water. The equipment and materials necessary for setting up and conducting the remediation process, which includes the pump and treat method, are transported over a distance of 400km to the remediation site.
该数据集描述了一个环境修复过程，专注于地下水处理。所述过程，即地下水异位修复，涉及提取受污染的地下水进行处理。该数据的使用适用于已识别地下水污染的环境管理项目，需要进行修复以恢复水质。为了设置和进行修复过程（包括抽水和处理方法），必要的设备和材料被运输了400公里到修复现场。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sustainable remediation assessment of a chlorinated ethene plume: method evelopment, application, and assessment
Sustainable remediation assessment of a chlorinated ethene plume: method evelopment, application, and assessment

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for life cycle assessment, users should ensure that it is relevant to their specific groundwater remediation scenario, taking into account the distances involved in transporting equipment and materials. The LCA should reflect the environmental impact of transportation over a 400km journey. It is crucial for users to include transportation impacts in their LCA model as part of the overall assessment of the remediation process. Users should also consider if the equipment can be sourced closer to the site to reduce transportation impacts and must adjust the data accordingly if their transport distance differs from the 400km specified.
在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估时，用户应确保它与其特定的地下水修复情景相关，并考虑到运输设备和材料所涉及的距离。生命周期评估应反映400公里运输过程中的环境影响。用户在其生命周期评估模型中务必包括运输影响，作为整个修复过程评估的一部分。用户还应考虑是否可以在更靠近现场的地方采购设备，以减少运输影响，并且如果他们的运输距离与规定的400公里不同，必须相应调整数据。

completeness.common:other: Input kilometers, output equipment and materials arriving at the site
输入公里，输出到达现场的设备和材料

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
